message:
Dear {{ doc.lead_name }},

Thank you for meeting . We are regretful to inform you that we will not be

able to proceed further with your loan application.

In case of any other loan requirements please visit www.switchmyloan.in

You sit back and relax, while we do all the hard-work for your loan.

Regards,

Your Friendly loan buddy

Switch My Loan Pvt. Ltd.
name: Rejected
subject: Rejected
